# MarketplaceV3EnglishAuctions.getWinningBid() method

Get winning bid of an english auction

## Example

```javascript
// The ID of the auction
const auctionId = 0;
const winningBid = await contract.englishAuctions.getWinningBid(auctionId);
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
getWinningBid(auctionId: BigNumberish): Promise<Bid | undefined>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type         | Description    |
| --------- | ------------ | -------------- |
| auctionId | BigNumberish | the auction Id |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[Bid](./sdk.bid.md) \| undefined&gt;

## Remarks

Get the current highest bid of an active auction.
